song.title: Stories of Love
song.info:
aaaah
i m walking in my mind you re walking by my side living in my personal world but you re agree with this rules
show me love and how make it grow show me all the moves n all the laws but now i know love is so braitly n you re agree with this rules
stories of love have no chance to live in a such world of fear n anxiety
stories of love one day be dead rip in my heart my soul as a fingertip
inocence you beleive in love but life will change ur mind behind skin of beauty swine was hide n you re agree with this rules
speaking and i i would like to tell you i m falling in love but i m not sure that you will ready for this how can i explain such feeling cloose to a wolrd who had lost the love
